Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Rejuvenating Eye Mask, Cucumber Lotus

Brand: Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Organic Rose Petal, Organic Lavender, Organic Fennel, Cucumber Powder, Organic Brahmi, Organic Tulsi, & Organic Lotus Leaf

Directions: Place two mask sachets on a plate. Drizzle a tablespoon of boiling water over the sachets. C
book: 2424-Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Rejuvenating Eye Mask, Cucumber Lotus

chunk:
over the sachets. Cover, and let sit for five minutes. Next, place in the refrigerator for five minutes. Set one sachet on each eye for 10 minutes. If the sachet seems dry, sprinkle a small amount of water over it before placing on the eye. Follow with Ayurvedic Eye Gel.
